features: Playful Design: Great Papers! Ice Cream Scoops Letterhead features a delightful ice cream scoop design, perfect for birthdays, classrooms, invitations, and parties.
Generous Quantity: Each package contains 80 sheets of letter-sized letterhead paper, providing plenty of sheets for various creative projects.
Print Compatibility: Designed to work seamlessly with most inkjet and laser printers, making customization and printing a breeze.
Standard Size: With dimensions of 8.5" x 11", this letterhead paper is of a standard size, ideal for printing, crafting, and versatile applications.
Quality Paper: Made with a paper weight of 24 lb. (90Gsm), this letterhead paper offers a balance between thickness and easy handling.
body.description: Add a playful and charming touch to your special occasions with Great Papers! Ice Cream Scoops Letterhead. This letterhead paper showcases a delightful design featuring colorful ice cream scoops, making it an excellent choice for birthdays, classrooms, invitations, and parties. Each package contains 80 sheets of letter-sized paper, ensuring that you have an ample supply for all your creative projects. Designed to be compatible with most inkjet and laser printers, this letterhead paper allows you to effortlessly personalize and print your designs. With dimensions of 8.5" x 11", this paper is a standard size, making it perfect for various printing and crafting needs. The paper is crafted with a quality paper weight of 24 lb. (90Gsm), striking a balance between thickness and ease of handling. Enhance the visual appeal of your projects and celebrations with the vibrant and fun Great Papers! Ice Cream Scoops Letterhead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We all scream for ice cream!
reviews.reviewText: Great paper for my first graders to write about their favorite way to eat ice cream!I also used it to send my Welcome Letter to my families for the beginning of school!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Whats not to like about ice cream.? I just love the colors. So vibrant. I use the paper to write letters to soldiers. It cheers them p instead of just plain white paper. Will buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is great for using in printers
reviews.reviewText: If you keep a 1-inch margin in your document (probably 1.5 at the bottom), this will frame your letter/invitation/whatever just fine. Looks great! The back side is white, in case you're wondering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Cute and nice weight paper that we used in an "ice cream in a bag" making kit. Nice and colorful :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Super cute paper, great thickness! I use this to write letters on and it’s perfect. Only draw back is that it’s not lined but I knew that going in!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2020
